Class DoctorCtrl

java.lang.Object
userInfoControl.DoctorCtrl
All Implemented Interfaces:
AppointmentOutcomeRecordCtrl, IDocAppointmentCtrl, IPatientList, ISchedule, MedicalRecordCtrl
public class DoctorCtrl extends Object implements MedicalRecordCtrl, IDocAppointmentCtrl, IPatientList, ISchedule, AppointmentOutcomeRecordCtrl
Controller class that handles the doctor's medical record, appointment scheduling, personal schedule management, and other related functions. Implements the MedicalRecordCtrl, IDocAppointmentCtrl, ISchedule, and AppointmentOutcomeRecordCtrl interfaces.

    • getPatientList

      public static String[] getPatientList(String doctorID)
      Retrieves the list of patient IDs assigned to the doctor based on the hospital ID.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - the unique identifier for the doctor
      Returns:
      an array of patient IDs assigned to the doctor

    • viewUpcomingAppointment

      public void viewUpcomingAppointment()
      Displays the list of upcoming appointments that are either pending or confirmed. The list is filtered by checking the date and only shows appointments that occur in the future. Displays the appointment ID, patient ID, status, date, and time.
      Specified by:
      viewUpcomingAppointment in interface IDocAppointmentCtrl

    • recordAppointmentOutcome

      public void recordAppointmentOutcome()
      Records the outcome of completed appointments. This includes collecting the service type, prescribed medication, and consultation notes for the appointment. The system will then update the outcome record for the specified appointment.
      Specified by:
      recordAppointmentOutcome in interface IDocAppointmentCtrl

    • viewAppointmentOutcomeRecord

      public void viewAppointmentOutcomeRecord()
      Displays the appointment outcome records for completed appointments. The method retrieves and shows the records of outcomes for appointments that are marked as completed.
      Specified by:
      viewAppointmentOutcomeRecord in interface AppointmentOutcomeRecordCtrl

    • updateAppointmentOutcomeRecord

      public void updateAppointmentOutcomeRecord()
      Updates the appointment outcome record. This method allows modifications to existing outcome records. The details can include updating service type, prescribed medication, or consultation notes.
      Specified by:
      updateAppointmentOutcomeRecord in interface AppointmentOutcomeRecordCtrl
